title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - August 2019
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided Android/Pixel security updates for Aug  2019. All Pixel devices running Android 9 will receive these software updates as part of the August OTA, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. 

To find out in detail what has been updated, check out the official update here.

Overview : 

Build Number: 
Pixel 1 (XL) / Pixel 2 (XL) / Pixel 3 (XL) : PQ3A.190801.002
Pixel 3a (XL): PQ3B.190801.002
Notable fixes: 
Fixes Captive Portal crashes preventing some users from connecting to hotspots
Fixes for some Pixel 3a devices freezing on a blank screen 

Details of security fixes are found in this link : 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
